titles: God iudging among the gods. Opened in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament, upon the solemn day of monethly fast, March 26. 1645. / By Iohn Ward, minister of the gospel in Ipswich, and a member of the Assembly of Divines.
author: Ward, John, d. 1665.
publisher: Printed by I.L. for Christopher Meredith, at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
